author: pietverwilligen
body:
Dear Reco Conveners, dear Tracking POG Conveners

This PR contains a few changes in the tracking code to allow Run-1 tracking in absence of the calorimeter geometries. For this I had to hide some calorimeter calls behind TrackAssociatorParameters and I made a separate configuration file for Run-1 vertexing.
Please review and let me know your comments.
greets
Piet
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11700 (original by @pietverwilligen).
title: Test me0 muon reco 76 x v1
